user.title: Setting up the Ecowitt.
user.description:
The following steps must be performed to set up this integration.

Use the Ecowitt App (on your phone) for your Ecowitt WebUI at the device.
Pick your station -> Menu Others -> DIY Upload Servers.
Hit next and select 'Customized'

Pick the protocol Ecowitt, and put in the ip/hostname of your hass server.
Path have to match, you can copy with secure token /.
Save configuration. The Ecowitt should then start attempting to send data to your server.
